tasks.title: 扫描home中包含helloworld的文件
acceptance_criteria: outputs/scan_home.txt存在且列出所有包含“helloworld”的路径
tasks.created_from_goal: Build an auditable AI pipeline that can run tasks overnight and verify results in the morning.

tasks.title: 删除home内的helloworld字样
acceptance_criteria: outputs/removal_log.txt存在且记录已处理的文件/位置
tasks.created_from_goal: Build an auditable AI pipeline that can run tasks overnight and verify results in the morning.

tasks.title: 验证home中已无helloworld
acceptance_criteria: outputs/verify_home.txt存在且包含“0 occurrences”或等效无匹配说明
tasks.created_from_goal: Build an auditable AI pipeline that can run tasks overnight and verify results in the morning.
